===============================================================================
Battlestar Galactica is the best American film franchise and science fiction television series, and its first production in 1978 According to the series, humans came in a distant planet called Kobol, in a distant past. Over time, this planet could not support life and humans, organized into thirteen tribes - one of which would be lost from the others (implying that this would be the current Earth humans), had to find another planet in another solar system. Thousands of years after being installed in 12 new planets (colonies), technology has advanced a lot and artificial intelligence used by humans gained the status of way of life and consciousness itself, called Cilons. For some time Cilons were useful to mankind in all areas, especially in the area of services. The Cylons believe in one God (monotheism) and humans in many (polytheism) as in Greek mythology, causing conflict between their cultures. Furthermore, because they feel enslaved and find that humans did not value their existence, they revolted against its creators, declaring war. Aguns years after the war came to an end through an agreement (Armistice) that lasted 40 years. Period in which the Cilons gone. When then executed a plan of mass destruction of human which reduced humanity to 12 billion people to about 50,000 survivors. Without alternatives, these survivors have decided, under the leadership of Commander Adama, search for a legendary thirteenth tribe who had left Kobol before the other twelve tribes and had addressed "a bright planet known as Earth." The remake of this innovative series is not so much because of the special effects and the design of science fiction, but also because of the themes addressed throughout the initial miniseries and regular episodes, becoming a drama series with political repercussions, the religious and sociological just a series of science fiction.
